Introduction
This topic contains information on eligibility to request substitution, including
eligibility to substitute
definition of categories of eligible persons
substitution by subordinate members prohibited
death of a substitute claimant
time limit to file a claim based on death of a substitute claimant
evidence requirements
, and
right to appeal the denial of a request to substitute
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B  - Substitution in Case of Death of Claimant
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
